ygData.subject: AE fear spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Have any of you people found real use for this spell? I tried it once against the critters in Mistmoore and the result was that a dark sacrificer pet attacked
ygData.messageBody:
Have any of you people found real use for this spell? I tried it once against the critters
in Mistmoore and the result was that a dark sacrificer pet attacked me, i think it was the
closest critter. Is the effect area the same as in Word of Pain? Meaning you have to be
very close to the mobs you want to fear? How often is that spell resisted? At the same
rate as the basic Fear spell?

I think the only use for that spell is when the party is being hammered by multiple creatures
and after casting going straigth to zone since the feared critters will bring a whole army of
other critters on us.

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 27 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
